kv22.4:1.3_0: Atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ, dhammasākacchā, paripucchā, sīlasamādānaṁ, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
kv22.4:1.5_0: natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
kv22.4:1.7_1: pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv22.4:2.4_0: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāroti?
kv22.4:2.7_0: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
